Drag a tab in the tab bar and drop it while holding down the ctrl key. I expect the mouse cursor to change to a similar looking cursor as Windows Explorer has when you hold down the ctrl key to drag a file to copy it instead of move.

This will make the duplicate tab feature more discoverable.

Reproducible: Always
